body.p: As a result of the Board’s redeliberations of the issues raised on the ED, three changes were made to the proposed amendments in the ED, other than drafting changes. Those three changes were:

li.p: modifying criterion (c) of the definition of a bearer plant (see paragraph BC62);
clarifying the transition provisions (see paragraph BC96); and
exempting entities from the disclosure requirements in paragraph 28(f) of IAS 8 for the current period in both the amendments to IAS 16 and the amendments to IAS 41 (see paragraph BC97).

body.p: Paragraphs BC48–BC117 summarise the Board’s considerations in developing the amendments and its reasons for only making limited changes to the amendments proposed in the ED.
